product_name: No7Lift & Luminate Triple Action Eye Cream
summary: SummaryNo7 Lift & Luminate Eye Cream helps skin tone look more even with a formula designed for delicate skin around the eyes.
details: DetailsBenefitsWith No7 Lift & Luminate eye treatment products, dark circles appear reduced in 2 weeks* (*Consumer study of UK women)Eye cream helps refresh tired looking eyes and visibly reduces the appearance of dark circles and wrinklesNo7 eye cream instantly hydrates the delicate skin around the eyes for skin that looks brighter and feels firmerAfter 2 weeks skin looks younger, wrinkles appear visibly reduced, and skin tone appears more even*Item 2521839How To UseUse morning and evening as part of your daily skincare routine. Cleanse skin and apply Lift & Luminate TRIPLE ACTION Serum. Dot Lift & Luminate TRIPLE ACTION Eye Cream around contours of the eye and gently blend in. Moisturize with Lift & Luminate TRIPLE ACTION Day or Night Moisturizer.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into the eyes rinse well with water immediately. Avoid contact with fabrics.IngredientsAqua (Water), Glycerin, Cyclopentasiloxane, Butyrospermum Parkii (Shea) Butter, Cyclohexasiloxane, Butylene Glycol, Cetearyl Alcohol, Alcohol Denat., Polyacrylamide, Glyceryl Stearate, Stearic Acid, Palmitic Acid, PEG-100 Stearate, Phenoxyethanol, Boron Nitride, C13-14 Isoparaffin, Methylparaben, Ascorbyl Glucoside, Propylene Glycol, Laureth-7, Tocopheryl Acetate, Sodium Hyaluronate, Pentylene Glycol, Ethylparaben, Hibiscus Abelmoschus Extract, Retinyl Palmitate, Phyllanthus Emblica Fruit Extract, Hydrolyzed Rice Protein, Tetrasodium EDTA, Sorbitan Laurate, Potassium Hydroxide, Hesperidin Methyl Chalcone, Panax Ginseng Root Extract, Carbomer, Steareth-20, Dimethylmethoxy Chromanol, Xanthan Gum, Polysorbate 20, Hydroxyethylcellulose, Acetyl Dipeptide-1 Cetyl Ester, Morus Alba Leaf Extract, Sodium Benzoate, Chlorhexidine Digluconate, Tocopherol, Potassium Sorbate, Dipeptide-2, Palmitoyl Tetrapeptide-7, Palmitoyl Tripeptide-1.
how_to_use: Use morning and evening as part of your daily skincare routine. Cleanse skin and apply Lift & Luminate TRIPLE ACTION Serum. Dot Lift & Luminate TRIPLE ACTION Eye Cream around contours of the eye and gently blend in. Moisturize with Lift & Luminate TRIPLE ACTION Day or Night Moisturizer.Precautions: Avoid contact with eyes. If product gets into the eyes rinse well with water immediately. Avoid contact with fabrics.

reviews.headline: Hydrates but doesn't lift
reviews.comments: This eye cream hydrates the undereye area well, but I wouldn't say it lifts mature skin.

reviews.headline: I would buy this again
reviews.comments: Good product; a great improvement from my previous eye cream.

reviews.headline: I Have Used This Product for Years
reviews.comments: I have used this product for years.  I have limited eye wrinkles even though I am 77 years old.  People cannot believe I am in my 70's.

reviews.headline: I would definitely buy this product again
reviews.comments: Have been using this product for years, and will continue.

reviews.headline: Used for almost 3 months but did not see enough results
reviews.comments: Overall, I'm a fan of No. 7. I used this product every day starting 5/6/24 and took pictures once a week to compare any changes. Almost three months later, I'm still waiting to see the results I was expecting. Their website and packaging say results typically appear in two weeks but that was not my experience. Did it lift? Not at all. Did it luminate? A little. This was the change I just started to see months later but to me that is not worth it. PS I'm M/34/Combo Skin Type/ Caucasian with a fair complexion.

reviews.headline: My go to
reviews.comments: Works great

reviews.headline: Great eye care product
reviews.comments: I love this eye care cream!! My go to

reviews.headline: No7 Lift and Luminate Triple Action Eye Crea
reviews.comments:
I haven't used No7 Lift and Luminate Triple Action Eye Cream long, but I do like what I am seeing!ðŸ˜Š

I'm using it mostly under my eyes. Sinus problems have caused puffiness, and it's not attractive.

I will continue using until my tube is gone!

reviews.headline: Does not take the puffiness away
reviews.comments: I wanted something to take the puffiness away under my eyes and the guy at Ulta said that it would.

reviews.headline: So far so good!
reviews.comments: Cream is working.

reviews.headline: I would not buy this product again.  Not for mature ladies
reviews.comments: It was very thin and watery - did nothing but increase puffiness under my eye

reviews.headline: amazing
reviews.comments: i highly recommend this product, i suffer from extreme darkness under the eyes and what can i say, with only two days of applying it twice a day my eye bags became lighter, this is the only product that has ever worked on me

reviews.headline: Irritating
reviews.comments: I gave it a fair 3 weeks use and I couldn't keep using it it made my under eyes so irritated and sensitive that it hurt to even rub my eye. I just threw it away I should've returned it

reviews.headline: Must Have!
reviews.comments: Per the directions, I use this product twice daily.  Ulta had a sale and I bought one at full price and the second at 50% off.  I gave one to my mother and she likes it too!

reviews.headline: Irritated my eyes
reviews.comments: I have somewhat sensitive skin and eyes, and this made me itchy. Couldn't use it long enough to see any results.

reviews.headline: I buy this eye cream regularly
reviews.comments: This eye cream is excellent and I buy it regularly. It is great for the price.

reviews.headline: Burning & Redness
reviews.comments:
I bought this eye cream on sale to see what other products were out there. My skin is combination, and at 24, I'm just looking for a solid moisturizer I can use with eye makeup. 

Unfortunately, every time I used this product, it made my eyes burn and turned the skin around my eyes red and inflamed. I tried everything. I tried using it every other day to get my skin used to it, I stopped using it altogether and came back to it, I tried sticking it out to see if my skin would acclimate - nothing worked. I won't be buying it again, and switched back to my old Clinique eye moisturizer.

reviews.headline: Burns
reviews.comments: The product lasted me 4 months. Majority of the time it burned & left my under eyes red. This provided no hydration or de puffing. Not worth it.

reviews.headline: An Absolute Must!
reviews.comments:
I have tried more lifting and illuminating eye creams than I care to admit to. Some costing ridiculous amounts of money. This little beauty is worth it. 
It does dry your eyes out a bit, but I either use a moisturizer for the eyes first or mix it with No7 hydrating drops. I now use their full line of skin care products. 
If you are into clean, then this is not for you. Price wise it's good and I'm not in the poor house. 
I had noticeable results first use and I don't do the twice daily regimen they suggest. I highly recommend this for its awesome lifting power and dark circle combatting. It also does a great job on my fine lines

reviews.headline: Irritates my eyes
reviews.comments: I wanted to like this eye cream so bad, because it really does a great job moisturizing the skin around my eyes. But I found that it made my eyes sting and water after use, so I unfortunately had to stop using it.

light, does not burn my eyes,  goes on nicely

faceoff_positive.comments: I am in my twenty's now and I started to notice crows feet very slightly developing at the corners of my eyes. Naturally, I panicked and knew I had to find an excellent eye cream. After using this product, I knew I found a great eye cream. The cream feels light weight and comes out of the tube in small amounts, so I don't feel like I'm grabbing too much product and having to waste it. I have been using the product for about two weeks and I have noticed a visible difference. My under eyes are no longer puffy, and the skin is moisturized very well. And to my shock, my very subtle crows feet have disappeared completely! I cannot say this product has the power to reverse deeply set wrinkles around the eye, but it was perfect for mine! The eye cream does claim to reduce darkness under the eyes, and I have only noticed a slight difference in my dark circles. Overall, this product is the perfect drugstore eye cream!
faceoff_positive.headline: A Perfect Drugstore Eye Cream!

faceoff_negative.comments: This eye cream didn't do anything to diminish my dark circles, but I can usually look past this because I have yet to find an eye cream that actually does anything when it comes to my circles. However, this eye cream was not at all moisturizing for my dry undereye area and also severely irritated my skin. I ended up returning this and I'm trying out something new now.
faceoff_negative.headline: Irritated my eyes
